author: Ron Swanson
text: Fish, for sport only, not for meat. Fish meat is practically a vegetable.

author: Ron Swanson
text: I don't want to paint with a broad brush here, but every single contractor in the world is a miserable, incompetent thief.

author: Ron Swanson
text: I wanna punch you in the face so bad right now.

author: Ron Swanson
text: America: The only country that matters. If you want to experience other ‘cultures,’ use an atlas or a ham radio.

author: Ron Swanson
text: Honor: if you need it defined, you don't have it.

author: Ron Swanson
text: No home is complete without a proper toolbox. Here's April and Andy's: A hammer, a half eaten pretzel, a baseball card, some cartridge that says Sonic and Hedgehog, a scissor half, a flashlight filled with jellybeans.
